title: Samsung's Black Friday TV deals knock up to $1,400 off OLED, The Frame models
description: Ready to upgrade your TV to a panel that looks better and is energy efficient? Samsung is slashing prices on QLED and OLED TVs during its Black Friday sale, with savings up to $1,400 off.Samsung OLED TVs are marked down for Black Friday 2024.Samsung's sleek Frame panels are eligible for triple-digit savings this holiday weekend, with this $1,299 65-inch model a top choice due to its blend of affordability and a slim design. With the included Slim-fit Wall Mount, you can hang The Frame flush against your wall and use Art Mode to display a variety of pieces.View Frame TV deals Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Ready to upgrade your TV to a panel that looks better and is energy efficient? Samsung is slashing prices on QLED and OLED TVs during its Black Friday sale, with savings up to $1,400 off.
text: Samsung OLED TVs are marked down for Black Friday 2024. Ready to upgrade your TV to a panel that looks better and is energy efficient? Samsung is slashing prices on QLED and OLED TVs during its Black Friday sale, with savings up to $1,400 off. Samsung's sleek Frame panels are eligible for triple-digit savings this holiday weekend, with this $1,299 65-inch model a top choice due to its blend of affordability and a slim design. With the included Slim-fit Wall Mount, you can hang The Frame flush against your wall and use Art Mode to display a variety of pieces. Discounted prices across The Frame line start at $549.99, with markdowns of up to $1,300 off, depending on the size. Enjoy pure blacks with OLED technology, making movies immersive and lifelike. Prices start at $999.99 on the S85D line, with markdowns of up to $1,400 off.
html:
Samsung OLED TVs are marked down for Black Friday 2024.

Ready to upgrade your TV to a panel that looks better and is energy efficient? Samsung is slashing prices on QLED and OLED TVs during its Black Friday sale, with savings up to $1,400 off.

Samsung's sleek Frame panels are eligible for triple-digit savings this holiday weekend, with this $1,299 65-inch model a top choice due to its blend of affordability and a slim design. With the included Slim-fit Wall Mount, you can hang The Frame flush against your wall and use Art Mode to display a variety of pieces.

Discounted prices across The Frame line start at $549.99, with markdowns of up to $1,300 off, depending on the size.

Enjoy pure blacks with OLED technology, making movies immersive and lifelike. Prices start at $999.99 on the S85D line, with markdowns of up to $1,400 off.
